aka: Por Mai Lek Tai Song Tua

cast.name: 瓦拉甘·萨瓦功 Varakorn Sawasakorn
帕妮查达·姗苏万 Panichadar Sangsuwan
南塔赛·维萨亚普拉 Nanthasai Visalyaputra

this_title: พ่อหม้ายเลขท้ายสองตัว (2020)
trans_title: Por Mai Lek Tai Song Tua
introduction: When Panu’s twin children Oley & Nene want Karaked, a teacher, to be their stepmom, the two start to play cupid. But their obstacles are General Samurjai, Karaked’s father who tries every way to intervene between Panu and Karaked and the twin’s maternal grandmother Khun Nuankae, who wants to take custody of the two children. So Panu must use his love and sincerity to prove to everyone.
foreign_title: พ่อหม้ายเลขท้ายสองตัว (2020)
